text: Morning we’ve got a client wanting a price / budget calculator for their site. I really like HubSpot version on their site. My question is how easy is it to recreate?
The calculator part isn't hard. Styling the range slider...
Particularly if you have a gradient behind the thumb
Shouldn’t be too hard. Vue might be a good thing to use for this

I'm attempting to insert a module into the `Additional <head> markup` section of my drag and drop template.  (I created a module to create some meta tags for a search application) -- I'm getting these errors, image below:
1. Error:Additional <head> markup
Syntax error in "[missing {{token}} value]"

2. Error:Additional <head> markup
Syntax error in "[missing {{token}} value]"

3. Warning:Additional <head> markup
[missing “en-us.designdata.models.sourceError.SYNTAX_NOT_RECOMMENDED” translation]
Anyone know what these errors mean and how to resolve this?
Thanks for the heads up - looks like a bug on our end displaying the errors. I’ll let the team know.
Thanks <@U7NG431HN> -- Do you think this is something that will get corrected in the next few hours or next few days?

```1.
Error:Unexpected token [EndTag] when in state [InBody]
2.
Error:Unexpected token [StartTag] when in state [InBody]```
I just got those errors as well when I attempted it in another template
Sorry, I don’t work on the Design Manager myself, but I let that team know!
Okay, cool, thanks!
It's Luke! Long time no see! :wave:
